> They don't run quite as well as the Linux versions, but they run 
pretty well. The only feature that didn't work for me was fullscreen 
mode (of course, the machine I tested this on didn't have speakers or 
joysticks, so those may or may not work).

I'll add a couple of more things.  Some of the cheat codes didn't 
work: the cheat code for tranforming to another character type caused 
the program to crash.  Also, the cheat code for boosting/lowering 
experience level caused the game to crash.  The cheat code for 
adding/subtracting additional funds didn't work.  Everything else 
seemed to work.

Yes, the sound works.
